metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Machine Learning in Production
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In the first course of Machine Learning Engineering for Production Specialization, you will identify the various components and design an ML production system end-to-end: project scoping, data needs, modeling strategies, and deployment constraints and requirements; and learn how to establish a model baseline, address concept drift, and prototype the process for developing, deploying, and continuously improving a productionized ML application.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Human-level Performance (HLP),Concept Drift,Model baseline,Project Scoping and Design,ML Deployment Challenges,
